changeSet.author: gfouquet
changeSet.comment: We save data from TEST_STEP before it is migrated
createTable tag with "#temptable" as name creates a regular table in mysql so we use regular sql as fallback
changeSet.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE OLDSTEPS ( TEST_STEP_ID BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ACTION TEXT NULL, EXPECTED_RESULT TEXT NULL, ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL )
insert into OLDSTEPS (TEST_STEP_ID, ACTION, EXPECTED_RESULT, ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID) select TEST_STEP_ID, ACTION, EXPECTED_RESULT, ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID from TEST_STEP

changeSet.author: gfouquet

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from OLDSTEPS o where not exists ( select 1 from ACTION_TEST_STEP a where o.TEST_STEP_ID = a.TEST_STEP_ID and a.ACTION = o.ACTION and a.EXPECTED_RESULT = o.EXPECTED_RESULT and a.ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID = o.ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID);

changeSet.comment: We check that ACTION_TEST_STEP table contains all of TEST_STEP data
